item.description:
Seven Habits of Highly Effective People


When I first read Stephen Covey's book about the seven habits, my first thought was "oh, he is one of us!" By that, I meant that he has the wisdom of one who is in touch with his spirit. The book holds wonderful message about self-empowerment, the law of attraction (although it is not referred to as such!) and other valuable skills one is better for if one is to live a spiritually based life.

We are honored to have Paul who is a trainer in the Seven Habits to come and help us gain a deeper understanding of this important work, which is certainly worth revisiting if it has been some time or visiting if you have never read the book!

As always, come for good food, good conversation and a great time. Bring enough food to feed at least four people and we will see you soon!!
item.name: Seven Habits of Highly Effective People!
